titleStmt.title: Two sermons preached in the Tovver. The former, on Sunday the 30. day of Ianuary. 1641. The later, on Sunday the 24. day of April. 1642. By the Bishop of Bath and Wells.
titleStmt.author: Piers, William, 1580-1670.
W. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. for Charles Greene, and are to be sold in Ivy Lane at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: The Bishop of Bath and Wells = William Piers.
"To the reader" signed by the editor, W.D.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Ivy Lane at the signe of the Gun
